thread.title: As it happened: Wolves chief executive Jez Moxey breaks silence on sale of club
thread.title_full: As it happened: Wolves chief executive Jez Moxey breaks silence on sale of club

title: As it happened: Wolves chief executive Jez Moxey breaks silence on sale of club
text:
Jez Moxey speaks on Wolves sale 1 unseen new items This live stream has now ended. Updates appear in chronological order. 11:00 
Good morning from the Express & Star digital desk and thanks for joining us for our live coverage of Jez Moxey's press conference on Steve Morgan's departure and the sale of Wolves. 11:01 
We're expecting things to kick off at 11.30am, and our sports, news, video and photo journalists will be bringing you all the latest from Molineux throughout the morning. 11:06 
You'll remember the bombshell announcement on at 5.09 pm on Monday evening that Wolves owner Steve Morgan had put the club up for sale and was standing down from his role as chairman with immediate effect. Read the full story here. 11:09 
"Morgan will step down immediately from the board. However his commitment to the club somehow remains the same? Something doesn't add up there." Our man at Molineux Tim Spiers gave his early reaction to the shock announcement in this blog post. Read the full story here. 11:11 
“It is my great privilege and pleasure to succeed Sir Jack as the new owner of this famous club and I thank him sincerely for his trust in me." 
We tracked Steve Morgan's eight-year reign as Wolves owner - in his own words.
